00008 FloatHistogram2D::FloatHistogram2D(UInt_t id, const HistPar &binning_x, const HistPar &binning_y )
00009 {
00010   _obj = new lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl(kNHistogram2DInts,kNHistogram2DFloats+(binning_x.nBins()+2)*(binning_y.nBins()+2),kNHistogram2DDoubles) ;
00011   _createdObject=true;
00012   _obj->setIntVal(kHistogram2DId,id);
00013   setBinning(binning_x, binning_y);
00014   reset();
00015 }

00035 void FloatHistogram2D::reset()
00036 {
00037   _obj->setDoubleVal(kHistogram2DEntries,0.);
00038   for (UInt_t bin_i=0; bin_i<nBinsTotal(); bin_i++) {
00039     setBinContent(bin_i,0);
00040   }
00041 }
00042 
00043 Float_t FloatHistogram2D::xMean() const 
00044 {
00045   Double_t sum=0; 
00046   Float_t x=xMin();
00047   Float_t x_step=(xMax()-xMin())/xNBins();
00048   x+=x_step*.5;
00049   for (UInt_t binx_i=xFirstBinIndex(); binx_i<=xLastBinIndex(); binx_i++) {
00050     Double_t projection=0;
00051     for (UInt_t biny_i=yUnderflowBinIndex(); biny_i<=yOverflowBinIndex(); biny_i++) {
00052       projection+=binContent(binIndex(binx_i,biny_i));
00053     }
00054     sum+=x*projection;
00055     x+=x_step;
00056   }
00057 
00058   Double_t n=entries()-xOverflow()-xUnderflow();
00059   if (n>0) {
00060     sum/=n;
00061   }
00062   return sum;
00063 }
00064 
00065 Float_t FloatHistogram2D::xRms(bool natural) const 
00066 {
00067   Double_t sum=0; 
00068   Double_t sum2=0; 
00069   Float_t x=xMin();
00070   Float_t x_step=(xMax()-xMin())/xNBins();
00071   x+=x_step*.5;
00072   for (UInt_t binx_i=xFirstBinIndex(); binx_i<=xLastBinIndex(); binx_i++) {
00073     Double_t projection=0;
00074     for (UInt_t biny_i=yUnderflowBinIndex(); biny_i<=yOverflowBinIndex(); biny_i++) {
00075       projection+=binContent(binIndex(binx_i,biny_i));
00076     }
00077     sum+=x*projection;
00078     sum2+=sqr(x)*projection;
00079     x+=x_step;
00080   }
00081 
00082   Double_t n=entries()-xOverflow()-xUnderflow();
00083   if (n>1) {
00084     Double_t mean=sum/n;
00085     sum2=(sum2-mean*sum)/( (natural  ? n-1 : 1));
00086     return sqrt(sum2);
00087   }
00088   else {
00089     return 0.;
00090   }
00091 }
00092 
00093 Float_t FloatHistogram2D::yMean() const 
00094 {

00098   y+=y_step*.5;
00099   for (UInt_t biny_i=yFirstBinIndex(); biny_i<=yLastBinIndex(); biny_i++) {
00100     Double_t projection=0;
00101     for (UInt_t binx_i=xUnderflowBinIndex(); binx_i<=xOverflowBinIndex(); binx_i++) {
00102       projection+=binContent(binIndex(binx_i,biny_i));
00103     }
00104     sum+=y*projection;
00105     y+=y_step;
00106   }
00107 
00108   Double_t n=entries()-yOverflow()-yUnderflow();
00109   if (n>0) {
00110     sum/=n;
00111   }
00112   return sum;
00113 }

00115 Float_t FloatHistogram2D::yRms(bool natural) const 
00116 {
00117   Double_t sum=0;

00120   Float_t y_step=(yMax()-yMin())/yNBins();

00125       projection+=binContent(binIndex(binx_i,biny_i));
00126     }

00129     y+=y_step;

00143 Double_t FloatHistogram2D::integral(UInt_t x0_i, UInt_t x1_i, UInt_t y0_i, UInt_t y1_i) const 
00144 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00145   throw(std::range_error)
00146 #endif
00147 {
00148 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00149   xRangeCheck(x0_i);
00150   xRangeCheck(x1_i);
00151   yRangeCheck(y0_i);
00152   yRangeCheck(y1_i);
00153 #endif
00154   Double_t sum=0; 
00155   for (UInt_t binx_i=x0_i; binx_i<=x1_i; binx_i++) {
00156     for (UInt_t biny_i=x0_i; biny_i<=y1_i; biny_i++) {
00157       sum+=binContent(binIndex(binx_i,biny_i));
00158     }
00159   }
00160   return sum;
00161 }
